details:
Essential medical tools used for diagnosis and treatment.
Ensures safe and effective patient care in hospitals.

Soft cotton used for wound cleaning and dressing.
Helps prevent infection and promotes healing.

Disposable syringe used for injecting medicines.
Ensures accurate dosage and patient safety.

Clean and comfortable bed sheets for patients.
Maintains hygiene and comfort in hospital wards.

Protective gloves used during medical procedures.
Reduces risk of contamination and infection.

Standard uniform worn by hospital staff.
Ensures professional appearance and easy identification.

Medical scissors used for cutting bandages.
Designed for precision and safe handling.

Device used to measure body temperature.
Helps in early detection of fever and illness.
